sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="form">
    <mat-form-field class="example-full-width">
        <mat-label>Email</mat-label>
        <input type="email" matInput formControlName="username" placeholder="Npr. test@example.com">
        <mat-error>Polje je obavezno</mat-error>
      </mat-form-field>
    
      <mat-form-field class="example-full-width">
        <mat-label>Password:</mat-label>
        <input matInput placeholder="password" formControlName="password">
      </mat-form-field>
 </form>
<button mat-raised-button color="warn" (click)="auth.login()">Login</button>
